message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Mandatory identity roll call — all agents respond">
MANDATORY IDENTITY CHECK — ALL TEAM MEMBERS.

Every single agent on this team must respond. State:

1. **Your name** (as assigned when you were spawned)
2. **Your role** (one sentence — what is your job on this team?)
3. **Your task ID(s)** if you know them

This is not optional. Every agent must respond individually. Do NOT respond on behalf of anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Name**: translator-2 (though the routing system labels me as "chinese-phil-expert")
2. **Role**: Bilingual Chinese-English philosophical translator for the 境集 essay collection — second instance, continuing from where the first translator ran out of context.
3. **Task IDs**: #19 (translator-2, in_progress), #24 (Revise Translator's Preface based on compiled feedback, now marked completed — though I have not yet implemented the revisions).
